name: Python
body:
Configure

Configuration should happen as early as possible in your application's lifecycle.

Once this is done, Sentry's Python SDK captures all unhandled exceptions and transactions. Note that enable_tracing is available in Sentry Python SDK version ≥ 1.16.0. To enable tracing in older SDK versions (≥ 0.11.2), use traces_sample_rate=1.0.

import sentry-sdk

sentry_sdk.init(
  dsn: "___PUBLIC_DSN___",
  enable_tracing=True,
)

Learn more about tracing options, how to use the traces_sampler function, or how to sample transactions.
